name: pm4.71r

stmt.origin: bitri(wi(w0, w1), wb(w0, wa(w1, w0)), wb(w0, wa(w0, w1)))

body.origin:
|- wb(wi(w0, w1), wb(w0, wa(w1, w0)))
-| wb(wi(w0, w1), wb(w0, wa(w0, w1)))
-| wb(wb(w0, wa(w0, w1)), wb(w0, wa(w1, w0)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wi(w0, w1), wb(w0, wa(w1, w0)))
-| wb(wi(w0, w1), wb(w0, wa(w0, w1)))
-| wb(wb(w0, wa(w0, w1)), wb(w0, wa(w1, w0)))

|- wb(wi(w0, w1), wb(w0, wa(w1, w0)))
-| wb(wb(w0, wa(w0, w1)), wb(w0, wa(w1, w0)))

body.origin:
|- wb(wb(w0, wa(w0, w1)), wb(w0, wa(w1, w0)))
-| wb(wa(w0, w1), wa(w1, w0))

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wi(w0, w1), wb(w0, wa(w1, w0)))
-| wb(wa(w0, w1), wa(w1, w0))

comment: Implication in terms of biconditional and conjunction. Theorem *4.71 of [WhiteheadRussell] p. 120 (with conjunct reversed). (Contributed by NM, 25-Jul-1999.)
